problem_summary_simple: Remove minimum characters to ensure no three consecutive characters are the same.
problem_summary_technical: Use a two-pointer approach to build the fancy string, keeping track of consecutive character counts.
key_insights: The goal is to maintain a count of consecutive identical characters.
A two-pointer approach (read and write pointers) is efficient for in-place modification or building a new string.
Only append a character if its consecutive count is less than 3.
